com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.util
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.util.Config

public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

This is a configuration class for specific settings used for the optimizer (e.g. index level, user defined heuristics, Jena graph models)

Author:
Markus Stocker

public void setSamplingFactor(double samplingFactor)

setLimitMinProbability

public void setLimitMinProbability(boolean limitMinProbability)
This allows to specify if during cost estimation the min possible cost should be considered as lower bound for the estimation or not. The cost estimation algorithms may compute in certain cases a cost which is lower then the lower bound (usually 1/N where N is the number of triples contained in the ontology). Although a cost (expressed as a probability) cannot be lower than the cost of a single triple, the limitation might have undesired side effects. For instance, the limitation might estimate multiple patterns with the same lowest cost, although in reality this isn't true. By ignoring the lower bound, the optimizer (although wrong) still preserves an ordering, one that might reflect the real cost.

Parameters:
limitMinProbability -

limitMinProbability

public boolean limitMinProbability()
